subject: H/SQ Shifter
description_text:
Hello, could you explain to me how the H pattern shifter converts to
Sequential? Do I have to unscrew the top part and then screw the other one
on or is it easier? Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Stefan Dimitrov,  Please provide your order number and send me a few photos of the product so I can confirm the exact model you are using.

I'm talking about your new product that I want to pre order. Simsonn HS Pro
Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter

On Sat, Dec 6, 2025, 6:46 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Stefan Dimitrov,  The new shifter is fully compatible when switching between H-pattern and sequential modes. You just need to remove the shifter top and loosen two small screws to complete the change. Then, switch to sequential mode in the software.

Ok, thanks for the clarification.

On Sat, Dec 6, 2025, 7:08 AM support@simsonn.com
